name: Lucid Quest
description:
This is a dream base adventure game using a speed base system and a shot system that makes this game a hybrid of many game play styles.

You take the role of a fairy in a dream world name "Yume Usagi" who is often called "Dreamer" and her team of dream pals in a quest to save a kingdom of dream fairies from nightmares.
